title: Social Feed
shortDescription: Automatic stream for Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and more!
longDescription:
POWr Social Feed is the easy way of displaying your social media accounts on your website, so you can get more followers. Any time you post to social media the new post will also appear on your website, so you can automatically keep your content fresh and up-to-date.
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Social Feed?   

* **Boost conversions** - The easy way to increase conversions, SEO, and time spent on your website: automatically show fresh content from all of your social channels. 
* **Make it yours** - Customize your feed with your own colors and styles to perfectly match the design of your site. Control the frequency of updates too!
* **Get more followers** - Pull in any content from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, Vine, Vimeo, Google+, Pinterest and more. Allow your users to share  too!

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Connect to Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, YouTube, Twitter, Tumblr, Flickr, Vimeo, Dailymotion, or RSS.
* Combine images, videos, and text from all of your social sources in one gallery.
* Follow @handles, #hashtags, account, or site URLs.
* 24 hour automatic content updates.
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins).

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Enable content moderation and choose which posts to display or hide. 
* Update content more frequently (every hour or every 20 minutes).
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=social-feed).

# Why users love Social Feed:   

“I am in love with this cool app! Keeping up with social media content is always a struggle for me because I do everything, but this app makes it super easy to post my social media content to my site and in turn, get more social media followers from the process." - Defense Divas 

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Social Feed up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
author: POWr Inc

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: For businesses looking to test the water with new plugins.
products.longDescription:
* 24-Hour Content Updates
* Add 1 Account/Hashtag per Feed
* Display 6 Posts per Account

products.title: Starter
products.shortDescription: For businesses who have their own brand and want extra customization.
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Logo
* 12-Hour Content Updates
* Add 2 Accounts/Hashtags per Feed
* Display 12 Posts per Account
* Add Social Share Buttons

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: For growing businesses looking to stand out from the crowd and get more conversions.
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Logo
* 3-Hour Content Updates
* Add 4 Accounts/Hashtags per Feed
* Display 20 Posts per Account
* Add Social Share Buttons
* Add Custom CSS & JavaScript

products.title: Business
products.shortDescription: For total control that scales with your business, whether it’s big or small. Get every feature for every plugin.
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Logo
* 20-Minute Content Updates
* Add 15 Accounts/Hashtags per Feed
* Display 50 Posts per Account
* Add Social Share Buttons
* Add Custom CSS & JavaScript
* Manually Approve Posts
+ FREE Business Upgrade for all 50 POWr Plugins

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=social-feed).

# Why users love Social Feed:   

“I am in love with this cool app! Keeping up with social media content is always a struggle for me because I do everything, but this app makes it super easy to post my social media content to my site and in turn, get more social media followers from the process." - Defense Divas 

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Social Feed up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.

proposedApp.title: Social Feed
proposedApp.shortDescription: Automatic stream for Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and more!
proposedApp.longDescription:
POWr Social Feed is the easy way of displaying your social media accounts on your website, so you can get more followers. Any time you post to social media the new post will also appear on your website, so you can automatically keep your content fresh and up-to-date.
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Social Feed?   

* **Boost conversions** - The easy way to increase conversions, SEO, and time spent on your website: automatically show fresh content from all of your social channels. 
* **Make it yours** - Customize your feed with your own colors and styles to perfectly match the design of your site. Control the frequency of updates too!
* **Get more followers** - Pull in any content from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, Vine, Vimeo, Google+, Pinterest and more. Allow your users to share  too!

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Connect to Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, YouTube, Twitter, Tumblr, Flickr, Vimeo, Dailymotion, or RSS.
* Combine images, videos, and text from all of your social sources in one gallery.
* Follow @handles, #hashtags, account, or site URLs.
* 24 hour automatic content updates.
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins).

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Enable content moderation and choose which posts to display or hide. 
* Update content more frequently (every hour or every 20 minutes).
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=social-feed).

# Why users love Social Feed:   

“I am in love with this cool app! Keeping up with social media content is always a struggle for me because I do everything, but this app makes it super easy to post my social media content to my site and in turn, get more social media followers from the process." - Defense Divas 

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Social Feed up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
